GSD.description: Algorithmic complexity vulnerability in the java.util.regex.Pattern.compile method in Sun Java Development Kit (JDK) before 1.6, when used with spring.jar in SpringSource Spring Framework 1.1.0 through 2.5.6 and 3.0.0.M1 through 3.0.0.M2 and dm Server 1.0.0 through 1.0.2, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via serializable data with a long regex string containing multiple optional groups, a related issue to CVE-2004-2540.

description_data.value: Algorithmic complexity vulnerability in the java.util.regex.Pattern.compile method in Sun Java Development Kit (JDK) before 1.6, when used with spring.jar in SpringSource Spring Framework 1.1.0 through 2.5.6 and 3.0.0.M1 through 3.0.0.M2 and dm Server 1.0.0 through 1.0.2, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via serializable data with a long regex string containing multiple optional groups, a related issue to CVE-2004-2540.

advisories.affected_versions: All versions starting from 1-alpha0 up to 1.2.9, all versions starting from 2-alpha0 up to 2.5.6, all versions starting from 3.0-alpha0 up to 3.0.0.m2
advisories.description: Algorithmic complexity vulnerability in this package allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via serializable data with a long regex string containing multiple optional groups, a related issue to CVE-2004-2540.
advisories.not_impacted: All versions before 1-alpha0, all versions after 1.2.9 before 2-alpha0, all versions after 2.5.6 before 3.0-alpha0, all versions after 3.0.0.m2
advisories.title: Regular expression denial of service (ReDOS)

description_data.value: Algorithmic complexity vulnerability in the java.util.regex.Pattern.compile method in Sun Java Development Kit (JDK) before 1.6, when used with spring.jar in SpringSource Spring Framework 1.1.0 through 2.5.6 and 3.0.0.M1 through 3.0.0.M2 and dm Server 1.0.0 through 1.0.2, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via serializable data with a long regex string containing multiple optional groups, a related issue to CVE-2004-2540.

reference_data.name: 20090424 CVE-2009-1190: Spring Framework Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
